name: Christmas Cat-Isolation
description:
Christmas Cat-Isolation

Christmas Cat-Isolation is a video game done in the GB Studio Engine for the GB Studio Jam 2020.

Game Boy limitation

With the limitation of the Game Boy (and of the engine itself), the game was created/designed around that.

Controls

Here are the keys used to play the game.

Up - Up Arrow / W - To save the game near a save point
Down - Down Arrow / S
Left - Left Arrow / A
Right - Right Arrow / D
A - Alt / Z / J - To shoot
B - Ctrl / K / X  - To jump
Start - Enter - To show objectives
Select - Shift - To show current health

Notes

Due to being a busy university student and not having a lot of time the game was made in 3 days. Due to that there are no sounds/music in the game. -Jay Hriscu
